summary: Riftrun Continued Christmas Edition to add to your yuletide cheer.
descriptionHtml:
Riftrun Continued Christmas Edition to add to your yuletide cheer.

[color=#00BFFF][size=4]Recomended Mods:[/size][/color]

[color=#00BFFF]Winter Overhaul - AceeQ's Skyrim Mods[/color] : Search Google for link
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48970]Skyrim christmas music replacer[/url] by visedgrunt

[color=#00BFFF][size=4]Resources used:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60774]A Festive Christmas[/url] by Absinthe.
[color=#FF0000]Author gives permission as long as original author is credited[/color]

Teddybears: Modder's Resource and esp
Authors: Tamira and Arion ; [url=http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/accessories/toon_teddy_bear/21-1-0-2215]Original model of the teddy by Abitor[/url]
Please vote for the file on that site of you like the teddy.

Rockinghorses: Modder's resource and Demo esp
Author: Tamira ; [url=http://archive3d.net/?a=download&id=d6687cc7]Original model of the rockinghorse by Walery Nowak[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28715]Christmas in Whiterun[/url] by Sargentcrunch
[color=#FF0000]Used with permission from Author[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47524]The Merry Snowberry[/url] by Jokerine
[color=#FF0000]Used with permission from Author[/color]

Christmas textures by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/10112975-hardcore1266]hardcore1266[/url] and [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/3568368-hardcore1277]hardcore1277[/url]

[url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1772-snowglobe-stuffs/]SnowGlobe Stuffs[/url] by InsanitySorrow
[url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1379-christmas-resource/]Christmas Resource Version: 1.0[/url] by InsanitySorrow

[color=#00BFFF][size=4]Inspiration taken from:[/size][/color]

The following authors use vanilla assets in creative ways.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27840]It's Christmas in Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27633]Whiterun Christmas Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28665]Christmas Themed Player Home[/url]
author: Sharlikran
